pages.text: Varialepis was a genus of small freshwater palaeoniscid fish from the Permian period. It was a carnivorous animal and would feed on smaller fish. Varialepis lad large eyes and a short body and may have swam in groups.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
